data.text: “Nɨ oragh. Datɨrɨghɨn kɨ bar osemegha iti,
Oio! God itir danganim, kɨ a gɨfogha deraghai,
Egha na batozir osɨmtɨzimɨn gun deravɨram a mɨgɨai,
Egh kɨ fogham, a ikarvazir manam nan mɨgɨrɨgɨabar anɨngam,
Ia ti ghaze, God nan apanim damuva, uan gavgavimɨn na abɨragham?
Kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn derazir gumazim, egh kɨ an guamɨn kotɨn tughtɨ,
“Ame! Kɨ aruem anadi naghɨn God buri, ezɨ a itir puvatɨ.
God uan ingangarim not ko sautɨn amadaghan a gami.
Ezɨ God nan daroriba bar dagh fo.
Tuavir God zuim, kɨ deravɨram an zui.
“Ezɨ God uabɨra, a bizitam damusɨ nɨghnɨghtɨ, tinara an nɨghnɨzim otevkɨnigham? Bar puvatɨgham.
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, bizir a na damuasa nɨghnɨzir manaba, an adar amuam.
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ an guamɨn tughamin bizir kam gɨnɨghnɨgha, puvɨram an atiati.
Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim nan gavgaviba bar da agɨvagha,
